OptionFile.h File Reference

Detailed Description

A class for handling option files.
';' delimits a comment to follow.
The general format is:
field, comment = value ; comment
e.g.
; A data value will follow this comment
DataValue, (some comment about it) = 88 ; another comment here
.

Author:
Glenn D. MacGougan (GDM)
Date:
2007-11-28
Since:
2006-12-07
